duties_responsibilities.duty: Inspect, service, repair, and maintain diesel locomotives.
Ensure compliance with all railroad rules and regulations for safety, operations, and the Federal Railroad Administration (FRA).
Fabricate, cut, shape, and perform finish operations using various types of materials.
Miscellaneous activities and responsibilities as assigned by manager.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma/GED. One year mechanical work experience or training. One year experience reading and interpreting technical drawings or schematics.
